hadiths.text: Narrated Salamah ibn al-Akwa': I said: Messenger of Allah, I am a man who goes out hunting; may I pray in a single shirt? He replied: Yes, but fasten it even if it should be with a thorn

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يُصَلِّي فِي قَمِيصٍ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: A Man Praying In A Qamis Only
